interface.name: tmbr_ctrl
interface.description: This interface allows to control the timber window manager.

request.name: client_focus
request.description: Focus client relative to the currently focussed one.

request.name: client_fullscreen
request.description: Set currently focussed client to fullscreen mode.

request.name: client_resize
request.description: Resize the currently focussed client. This will adjust the client's ratio in the given direction.

request.name: client_swap
request.description: Swap the currently focussed client with a neighboring one.

request.name: client_to_desktop
request.description: Send the currently focussed client to a neighboring desktop.

request.name: client_to_screen
request.description: Send the currently focussed client to a neighboring screen.

request.name: desktop_focus
request.description: Focus desktop relative to the currently focussed one.

request.name: desktop_kill
request.description: Kill the currently focussed desktop. Only empty desktops may be killed.

request.name: desktop_swap
request.description: Swap the currently focussed desktop with a neighboring one.

request.name: screen_focus
request.description: Focus screen relative to the currently focussed one.

request.name: screen_dpms
request.description: Set the DPMS state of a screen. If a zero state is passed, then DPMS is disabled. Otherwise, it is turned enabled.

request.name: tree_rotate
request.description: Rotate the tree of the currently focussed client.

request.name: state_query
request.description: Query the state of the window manager.

request.name: state_quit
request.description: Cause the window manager to quit.
